1.title: Episode #3.1
1.plot: Hollywood Exes welcome a new member, Shanna Moakler, to the sisterhood as they gather for a brunch at Nicole's house. Drea arrives with an unexpected surprise but the event turns sour when Mayte suddenly erupts and storms out.

2.title: Episode #3.2
2.plot: Drea brings the women together for dinner in hopes that Mayte and Nicole can bury the hatchet. Unfortunately, a stubborn Mayte digs in her heels and offends both Sheree and Drea in the process.

3.title: Episode #3.3
3.plot: Shanna hosts a poker party, where Tony confronts Drea's fiancé. Jessica and Mayte introduce their new boyfriends.

4.title: Episode #3.4
4.plot: When Cali tells Tiffney she wants to be an actress, Tiffney must decide if this is the right step for her daughter. Meanwhile, Game puts his Blood Money crew in the line of fire in order to prove their loyalty.

5.title: Episode #3.5
5.plot: In the wake of Shanna's bombshell about Jessica, the women decide to sit Jessica down and give her a chance to explain. Meanwhile, Mayte is concerned about her ability to have more children and Drea comes to a heartbreaking realization during marriage counseling.

6.title: Episode #3.6
6.plot: Nicole wants all the women to join her on a trip to Hawaii, but Drea and Shamicka refuse to go if Jessica is invited. In preparation for the trip, Shanna hits up her plastic surgeon for a little liposuction and then checks in with a therapist to work through her fear of flying. Nicole, Sheree and Mayte make a last ditch effort to allow Jessica to explain herself - but the conflict quickly escalates, leaving the women wondering if their friendship is beyond repair.

7.title: Episode #3.7
7.plot: Aloha! The ladies are in Hawaii for fun, sun and sisterhood. But while Drea, Shamicka and Shanna are thrilled to be without Jessica - her absence isn't sitting right with Nicole. Mayte admits that her new relationship is in trouble and a game of Truth or Dare brings up the pain of the past, pushing Drea over the edge.

8.title: Episode #3.8
8.plot: The week of Drea's wedding has arrived and a sudden appearance by Jessica has everyone reeling. Meanwhile, Sheree makes a startling confession to Terrell, and Mayte and Humberto finally come to a decision about their future. Last minute problems plague the hours leading up to the wedding, and Brian drops a major musical surprise during the ceremony.

1.title: Episode #1.1
1.plot: Nicole Murphy, Andrea Kelly, Sheree Fletcher, Jessica Conseco and Mayte Garcia are out to establish themselves as independent, successful women and bring relevance and honor to themselves separate from their very famous exes.

2.title: Episode #1.2
2.plot: Despite warnings from her friends, Jessica seriously considers letting Jose move back in with her. Anxious to meet Mr. Right, Mayte resorts to a professional matchmaker, who urges her to "de-Prince" her home.

3.title: Episode #1.3
3.plot: Just when Jessica thinks she might still be in love with Jose, she receives a bombshell from him. Meanwhile, Sheree and Terrell find themselves at odds over their long-distance marriage.

4.title: Episode #1.4
4.plot: Anxious to escape the stress in their lives, the ladies head to Napa Valley for a weekend of fine food, fine wine, and (hopefully) fine men. On the trip, Jessica confronts Jose about his bad choices, and gives him an ultimatum.

5.title: Episode #1.5
5.plot: Nicole sets Mayte up on her first blind date, which stresses Mayte out. Meanwhile, Jessica breaks the news about Jose to Josie, and then is shocked to learn that Josie is planning a visit to Planned Parenthood.

6.title: Episode #1.6
6.plot: Tony sets Andrea up on a date with a local friend. Andrea is willing to meet him, but worries how he will react when he finds out that R. Kelly is her ex.

7.title: Episode #1.7
7.plot: Controversy erupts during a weekend getaway to Palm Springs after Jessica accuses the others of being hypocrites. Not one to take it lightly, Sheree calls Jessica out by bringing up a private matter that Jessica had confided to her in confidence.

8.title: Episode #1.8
8.plot: Back in L.A., resentments are still simmering after the altercation in Palm Springs. Mayte, who receives bad news from a fertility expert, is especially sensitive, and confronts Jessica during a ladies night out, resulting in an emotional showdown.

9.title: Episode #1.9
9.plot: The ladies take sides after the confrontation between Mayte and Jessica. Meanwhile, Andrea starts to feel pressure from Percy, and worries that their relationship is moving too quickly.

10.title: Episode #1.10
10.plot: Mayte and Jessica attempt to repair their damaged relationship. Meanwhile, Sheree pitches her skin product, Whoop-Ash, to skeptical executives at a trendy Hollywood boutique.

11.title: Episode #1.11
11.plot: In this dramatic season finale, the ladies rehearse a number for Andrea's upcoming dance benefit, during which one of them has a serious and painful accident. With less than an hour before show time, an ambulance is called...

1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: All is not well in the sisterhood of the HOLLYWOOD EXES. Drea, who has been spending more time back in Chicago, is offended by a comment Jessica tweeted, and plans to confront her. Mayte has big baby news, which she plans to announce to the group.

2.title: Episode #2.2
2.plot: Nicole's father suddenly passes away, prompting her to go to Sacramento and help her family make the funeral arrangements. Meanwhile, Jessica expresses her concerns to Mayte about her plans to adopt a baby.

3.title: Episode #2.3
3.plot: Nicole anticipates receiving an award during a glamorous charity event. At the event, she calms her nerves by drinking. A lot. By the time she gets to the stage, it becomes obvious that she's drunk.

4.title: Episode #2.4
4.plot: Nicole receives a visit from her friend Shamicka Lawrence, the recent ex-wife of Martin Lawrence, and wants to introduce her to the other Hollywood Exes. Meanwhile, Drea is incensed by a comment Jessica made after meeting Mayte's new baby.

5.title: Episode 5
5.plot: Shamicka meets up with Jessica, Sheree and Nicole in NYC, where Nicole will be making an appearance with her fiancé, Michael Strahan, on "Live with Kelly and Michael". Meanwhile, Drea returns to Chicago to spend time with Tony and her family. While rehearsing with her dance company, she worries that her foot may never fully recover.

6.title: Episode #2.6
6.plot: Jessica invites everyone to her lingerie-themed birthday party. Drea, who still has issues with Jessica, chooses not to attend. This prompts Jessica to confront her in person, during which all hell breaks loose...

7.title: Episode #2.7
7.plot: An emotional Drea reveals the personal struggles she's dealing with back in Chicago, which play a part in her behavior towards Jessica. Meanwhile, Nicole plans a birthday party and expects both Drea and Jessica to attend.

8.title: Episode #2.8
8.plot: The girls head out of town for a weekend in Park City. Sparks fly when Mayte realizes the other women plan on wearing real fur. Things go from bad to worse when Mayte threatens to leave.

9.title: Episode #2.9
9.plot: Still in Park City, Nicole feels compelled to hide one of her furs from Mayte. Later, while she, Sheree, and Shamicka are out shopping, Mayte and Jessica find the fur and decide to make a statement by cooking it.

10.title: Episode #2.10
10.plot: Now that her pre-nup is almost settled, Nicole starts to think seriously about planning a wedding, and searches for the perfect dress.

11.title: Episode #2.11
11.plot: With her foot still not fully healed, Drea produces a fitness video for curvy women. Meanwhile, Jessica and Mayte attend a Hollywood party where they run into Jessica's most recent ex, Garth, who is with his new girlfriend.

12.title: Episode #2.12
12.plot: With coaxing from Mayte, Jessica decides to talk to Garth and find out if he still has feelings for her. Drea wants to celebrate her birthday by teaching the others how to pole dance.

13.title: Episode #2.13
13.plot: The girls head to Vegas to throw a bachelorette party for Nicole. As the night progresses, things go from bad to worse, and Nicole's bachelorette party might be ruined.

-1.title: Episode dated 8 July 2013
-1.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

imdb.plot outline: They kept the homes fires burning while their husbands were topping the music charts and setting box offices ablaze worldwide. But now, as Hollywood's A-List ex-wives, they must adjust their own courses without their former husbands and make a name for themselves.
imdb.title: Hollywood Exes
plot: They kept the homes fires burning while their husbands were topping the music charts and setting box offices ablaze worldwide. But now, as Hollywood's A-List ex-wives, they must adjust their own courses without their former husbands and make a name for themselves.::VH1
